title: Papa's Burgeria

controls: Use your mouse to play Papa's Burgeria
content.howToPlay: You'll begin by typing a name for a progress save slot. After watching cutscenes on how Marty or Rita ended up being an employee of this restaurant, you'll get on onboarding about stations. There are 3 stations in this game, unlike other gamerias: Order, Grill and Build.Start by listening carefully to what your customers crave. Get it wrong, and you'll hear about it in the form of a smaller tip.Next, time to grill those Hamburger Patties perfectly. Undercooked? Overcooked? No, thank you. We're aiming for burger perfection!Lastly, you will build burgers with the following ingredients. All of the ingredients are unlocked from the first day.Bottom Bun: The foundation of every burger dream.Hamburger Patty: The heart of the matter.Toppings: Choose from Cheese, Lettuce, Onion, Pickle, and Tomato to add flavor and texture.Sauces: Drizzle with BBQ Sauce, Ketchup, Mayo, or Mustard for that perfect taste.Top Bun: Crown your creation with this.After building the burger, drag the order ticket and present your masterpiece with a flourish.You'll repeat the same steps for different orders and customers. It might come easy at first, but soon, the restaurant will be bustling with hungry customers who hate waiting. So keep in mind that multitasking, speed and accuracy are your friends here.
content.developer: Papa's Burgeria is created by Flipline Studios.

fullContent: Home› RestaurantPapa's BurgeriaBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenWelcome to Papa's Burgeria Online, where the buns are fresh, the patties are sizzling, and every ingredient is at your fingertips! Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to run the most beloved burger joint in town. Take orders, grill burgers, and stack them high with all the fixings!After the scorching success of Papa's Pizzeria, Papa Louie decided it was time to grill up some profits with Papa's Burgeria, the second installment in the beloved Papa's Gameria series. You can play as Marty, Rita or Papa Louie himself to create yummy burgers and serve to customers.ControlsUse your mouse to play Papa's BurgeriaHow to Play Papa's BurgeriaYou'll begin by typing a name for a progress save slot. After watching cutscenes on how Marty or Rita ended up being an employee of this restaurant, you'll get on onboarding about stations. There are 3 stations in this game, unlike other gamerias: Order, Grill and Build.Start by listening carefully to what your customers crave. Get it wrong, and you'll hear about it in the form of a smaller tip.Next, time to grill those Hamburger Patties perfectly. Undercooked? Overcooked? No, thank you. We're aiming for burger perfection!Lastly, you will build burgers with the following ingredients. All of the ingredients are unlocked from the first day.Bottom Bun: The foundation of every burger dream.Hamburger Patty: The heart of the matter.Toppings: Choose from Cheese, Lettuce, Onion, Pickle, and Tomato to add flavor and texture.Sauces: Drizzle with BBQ Sauce, Ketchup, Mayo, or Mustard for that perfect taste.Top Bun: Crown your creation with this.After building the burger, drag the order ticket and present your masterpiece with a flourish.You'll repeat the same steps for different orders and customers. It might come easy at first, but soon, the restaurant will be bustling with hungry customers who hate waiting. So keep in mind that multitasking, speed and accuracy are your friends here.Extra FeaturesCustomizable Characters: Dress your avatar in chef's whites or go rogue with a burger suit. It's fashion week at the grill!Endless Fun: Each day brings new challenges, customers, and special orders. Can you handle the lunch rush with all the ingredients at your disposal?Achievements: Earn badges for everything from " Tomato Pro" to "Master of Mayo". If you be a nice kid, one day you can even see the "Better Than Papa" badge.DeveloperPapa's Burgeria is created by Flipline Studios.Get Flipping at OnlineGames.io!Dive into Papa's Burgeria now for a slice (or should we say a patty?) of burger-flipping fun with all ingredients unlocked. Just remember, in this game, the customer might not always be right, but they're always hungry! If you'd like to play another Papa's game, our recommendation is Papa's Pastaria. Try it now and let us know what you think in the comments section. This article was updated on January 14, 20251 Player2DCookingFlashFreeKidsMouseRestaurantTycoon
